problem:
问题23. 设 $a 、 b 、 c$ 是一个三角形的三边长.
证明:
$$
\frac{\sqrt{b+c-a}}{\sqrt{b}+\sqrt{c}-\sqrt{a}}+\frac{\sqrt{c+a-b}}{\sqrt{c}+\sqrt{a}-\sqrt{b}}+\frac{\sqrt{a+b-c}}{\sqrt{a}+\sqrt{b}-\sqrt{c}} \leqslant 3 .
$$
solution: 不妨设 $a \geqslant b \geqslant c$. 于是, $\sqrt{a+b-c}-\sqrt{a}=\frac{(a+b-c)-a}{\sqrt{a+b-c}+\sqrt{a}} \leqslant \frac{b-c}{\sqrt{b}+\sqrt{c}}=\sqrt{b}-\sqrt{c}$. 因此, $\frac{\sqrt{a+b-c}}{\sqrt{a}+\sqrt{b}-\sqrt{c}} \leqslant 1 \cdots$ (1). 设 $p=\sqrt{a}+\sqrt{b}, q=\sqrt{a}-\sqrt{b}$. 则 $a-b=p q, p \geqslant 2 \sqrt{c}$. 由柯西不等式有 $\left(\frac{\sqrt{b+c-a}}{\sqrt{b}+\sqrt{c}-\sqrt{a}}+\frac{\sqrt{c+a-b}}{\sqrt{c}+\sqrt{a}-\sqrt{b}}\right)^2= \left(\frac{\sqrt{c-p q}}{\sqrt{c}-q}+\frac{\sqrt{c+p q}}{\sqrt{c}+q}\right)^2 \leqslant\left(\frac{c-p q}{\sqrt{c}-q}+\frac{c+p q}{\sqrt{c}+q}\right)\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{c}-q}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{c}+q}\right)=\frac{2\left(c \sqrt{c}-p q^2\right)}{c-q^2}$. $\frac{2 \sqrt{c}}{c-q^2}=4 \times \frac{c^2-\sqrt{c} p q^2}{\left(c-q^2\right)^2} \leqslant 4 \times \frac{c^2-2 c q^2}{\left(c-q^2\right)^2} \leqslant 4$. 从而, $\frac{-\sqrt{b+c-a}}{\sqrt{b}+\sqrt{c}-\sqrt{a}}+\frac{\sqrt{c}+a-b}{\sqrt{c}+\sqrt{a}-\sqrt{b}} \leqslant 2$. 结合式(1)即得所证不等式.
